layer.name: Order
layer.definition: An arrangement that displays the relationship between elements via a particular sequence, pattern, or method; the belief that reality is intelligible, structured, and meaningful rather than chaotic and random.

questions.text: I believe the body operates according to discoverable principles â€” there are right and wrong ways to fuel it.
I believe nutrition, sleep, and environment affect the body in predictable, patterned ways.
I see evidence of physical order in how the body consistently responds to good or poor treatment.
I reject the idea that the body is random, unknowable, or that 'anything goes' for physical health.
I believe physical health can be studied, understood, and pursued systematically.
